update t_stock_result set code = #{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, code_name = #{codeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, result_type = #{resultType,jdbcType=CHAR}, result_type_name = #{resultTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, new_price = #{newPrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amplitude = #{amplitude,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, amplitude_price = #{amplitudePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, turnover = #{turnover,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, total_market_value = #{totalMarketValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, circulation_value = #{circulationValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, real_value = #{realValue,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, bodies_num = #{bodiesNum,jdbcType=INTEGER}, first_partner = #{firstPartner,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, stock_ratio = #{stockRatio,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day5 = #{day5,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day10 = #{day10,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, day20 = #{day20,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_stock_result ( id, CODE, code_name, result_type, result_type_name, new_price, amplitude, amplitude_price, turnover, total_market_value, circulation_value, real_value, bodies_num, first_partner, stock_ratio, day5, day10, day20, create_date ) ( SELECT REPLACE(UUID(),'-',''), today.code, today.code_name, '01', '反包', today.new_price, today.amplitude, today.amplitude_price, expand.turnover, expand.total_market_value, expand.circulation_value, expand.real_value, expand.bodies_num, expand.first_partner, expand.stock_ratio, ma.day5, ma.day10, ma.day20, '20170707' FROM t_stock yestoday, t_stock today, t_stock_expand expand, t_stock_ma ma WHERE yestoday.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND today.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND expand.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND ma.`create_date`=#{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND yestoday.`code` = today.`code` AND today.`code`=expand.`code` AND today.`code`=ma.`code` AND yestoday.`new_price` < yestoday.`today_open` AND today.`today_open` <= yestoday.`low_price` AND today.`new_price` >= yestoday.`height_price` AND today.`deal_vol` > yestoday.`deal_vol` AND today.`amplitude` > '0.03' AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM t_stock_ma ma WHERE ma.`create_date` = #{createDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND today.`code` = ma.`code` AND today.`new_price` > ma.`day20` AND yestoday.`new_price` > ma.`day20`) )
